title: Bonjour, Diamond Jim
description: Perhaps the most expensive 3 minutes in cinema, a drama about a man named Diamond Jim, based on the poem by Jim Joe Kelly.
quote: A girl can not say no to diamonds.
parent: Tim and Ericâ€™s Billion Dollar Movie
altHero: a Johnny Depp look-alike on a Paris street wearing a faceted, reflective suit
alt1: Diamond Jim walks down a street and nods at a woman with a stroller
alt2: Diamond Jim hands a beggar some diamonds
alt3: Diamond Jim speaks with a brunette woman
alt4: Diamond Jim presents the woman with a comically huge diamond ring
